resources.string: You can register yourself through the \"Add User\" function.You can enter details such as your name and age.To save these details you need to click on save button.To cancel the operation, you must click on cancel button.

You can edit the entered details through the \"Edit details\" function.You can enter new details such as your name and age.To save these new details, you need to click on update button.To cancel the operation, you must click on cancel button.

You can control various types of settings such as notification, change user details, reset settings etc.Through settings, you will be able to change your details, change the notification-related settings and there will also be a reset setting option that will allow you to completely reset the application data. The activity will also contain an option to delete your personal and prescriptional details.

You can add your new medications through \"Add medicine\" functionality. On the navigation menu,click on the \“Add New Medication\” , you will be presented with the screen where all your new medication details are inserted.First, you will be able to type the medication name and the dosage. Then you will be able to select the mode of scheduling. Two modes of scheduling are available for you: daily and weekly. In the daily mode, you can choose administration times which are applied to all the days of the week (the same to every weekday). In the weekly mode your scheduled administration times are applied separately for each day of the week. You can also select the start and the stop days of the drug administration period.Clicking on the drug image window will open the camera, enabling you to take and save the image of the medication box/label.
The calendar will show you all your saved medications on the screen. Along with the medication, the following details will also be shown: the dosage, the time and the day.

This functionality is accessible via the navigation menu. Its main purpose is to display your current inputted medications on a list. You will be able to scroll through all of your medications and even add a new medication from this.Each medication list item, when tapped, will show you the medication details.

Developers:
